channel.title: Against the Vampire Conspiracy - "AVH" & Throndal
channel.description: A late entry to the calendar as I wanted to wait until GCOG was mostly done. 3 sessions on the last three Wednesdays in November at 7pm (GMT) **One seat has been allocated to someone who played with the Gauntlet for the first time at GCOG.** **A second seat is reserved for 48hours for someone who hasn't played in any series I've run during 2021 - if that's you message me to put your name on the seat ... first come first served.** **If that reserved seat isn't taken up within 48 hours of the time of posting, it will fall to the first person on the waitlist.** **OPEN ACCES: Thu 21 Oct 2021** ![2021 10 14 Cover Image AtDC greyscale for Drivethru page even smaller|323x499](upload://jqQvzpwiIUSQCkFKN1GoaU1khMp.jpeg) Wed 10 Oct, 2021 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MmEf-MFyDDyWV4LzU9p Wed 17 Oct, 2021 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MmEfC7SIrxDeGvSTcYT Wed 24 Oct, 2021 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MmEfLK6C6nw4R79Xl3r

item.title: Against the Vampire Conspiracy - "AVH" & Throndal
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

A late entry to the calendar as I wanted to wait until GCOG was mostly done.
3 sessions on the last three Wednesdays in November at 7pm (GMT)
One seat has been allocated to someone who played with the Gauntlet for the first time at GCOG.
A second seat is reserved for 48hours for someone who hasn’t played in any series I’ve run during 2021 - if that’s you message me to put your name on the seat … first come first served.
If that reserved seat isn’t taken up within 48 hours of the time of posting, it will fall to the first person on the waitlist.
OPEN ACCES: Thu 21 Oct 2021
